Nerangs.ab: vahištōištōiš gāϑaiiā̊ sraōθrəm āiiese yešti xšnūmaine zaraθuštrahe spəntamahe aṣ̌aonō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e tā frasastaiiaēca zōt wāz gīrišnīh rāspīg aθā ratuš bowandag guftan rāspīg aθā ratuš bowandag guftan yō zaōtā bowandag guftan zōt aθā ratuš bowandag guftan

"(He should continue with) vahištōištōiš gāϑaiiā̊ sraōθrəm āiiese yešti xšnūmaine zaraθuštrahe spəntamahe aṣ̌aonō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e until frasastaiiaēca. (Then) taking of the wāz by the zōt and the rāspīg should recite complete aθā ratuš, (then) he should recite complete yō zaōtā and the zōt should recite complete aθā ratuš."
